A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I don't demand complete accuracy in my science fiction\, let alone Star Wars\, but parts of this movie really seemed like they were just testing to see how far they could go.

The movie seems like it really wants to subvert your expectations\, but it doesn't.  It just makes really poor decisions\, plot-wise\, repeatedly.  

Yeah\, I didn't expect some of the things that happened in the movie\, but not because they were surprising.  I didn't expect them because they were kind of bad\, and I expected something less bad.
